body: Hi, Aymeric, I'm not able to help to check you issue currently. Since you're testing Radiance parameters, the following advice provided in **Axel Jacob**'s tutorial might be helpful, and pardon me if you already know about it: [http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/documentation/docs/radiance...](http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/documentation/docs/radiance_tutorial.pdf) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/C1Uy1o3oshqSYLDsabwnWtfApglt3378MOg76peiNb*5sAGH9iV-HOoyF2OMLUaZcD2wz5*UzbzWc83ylK-xMNas3gwerZ1a/Image1.png)
